pull.title: ci: Disable valgrind functionl tests on forked repos to avoid timeouts
pull.body:
Allows people to fork our repo and run the tests again

Also print more cache stats

### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #18434 (tests: add a test-security target and run it in CI by fanquake)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
